scripts.setup: pnpm i && pnpm run --filter ./Fliessheck build && pnpm run --filter ./frontend build && pnpm i && pnpm run --filter ./backend build
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:fliessheck && pnpm run lint:fe && pnpm run lint:be
scripts.lint:ci: pnpm run lint:fliessheck:ci && pnpm run lint:fe:ci && pnpm run lint:be:ci
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:fliessheck" "pnpm run dev:fe" "pnpm run dev:be"
scripts.build: concurrently "pnpm run build:fliessheck" "pnpm run build:fe" "pnpm run build:be"
